bs-rssstandards-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of rss standars extension
bs-rssstandards-desc-rc:
Description of recent changes RSS feed from this wiki.
{{Related|Bs-rssstandards-desc}}
bs-rssstandards-desc-page:
Description of recent changes RSS feed from one specific page.
{{Related|Bs-rssstandards-desc}}
bs-rssstandards-title-own: Headline for own contributions RSS feed\n{{Identical|Own contributions}}
bs-rssstandards-desc-own:
Description of RSS feed for your own made contributions to the wiki.
{{Related|Bs-rssstandards-desc}}
bs-rssstandards-desc-cat:
Description of recent changes RSS feed from one specific category.
{{Related|Bs-rssstandards-desc}}
bs-rssstandards-desc-watch:
Description of RSS feed of your watchted pages.
{{Related|Bs-rssstandards-desc}}
bs-rssstandards-link-text-watch:
Option for recent changes RSS feed to specify the date range of the feed.

Parameters:
* $1 - timespan in days till now (starting from 1 day till 365 days in steps)
bs-rssstandards-desc-ns:
Description of recent changes RSS feed from one specific namespace.
{{Related|Bs-rssstandards-desc}}
bs-rssstandards-changes-from: Text message for changes by: $1\n*$1 is the username of the user who made the changes - use for GENDER distinction
